name: [AI] Detect-v1
info:
**DEPRECATED**

Make prediction on image with Tensorflow.js model trained with tequ-tf1-ca-training-pipeline.

https://github.com/juhaautioniemi/tequ-tf1-ca-training-pipeline

Model is loaded from /.node-red/config/model folder. 

Inference image and add result to output message. 

Adds basic image info to output message.

If image has exif data, this is added to output message.
